title: Just a tiny rant on how BS ratings are.

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: HOW THE FUCK IS THIS A A- LIKE MY GOD. Riot, while i do realize that I am being compared to other galio players, if other galio supports have a better KDA than this I will be quite shocked. Just, I'm salty about this and want to get it off my chest. I feel like kill participation should be weighted in this more. I mean, come on, I had a 71% kill participation and 44 god damn assists. Please, just refine this system so supports are more heavily rated on assist rather than kills.

replies.body: Almost 100 kills in a single game, wtf is that elo.

> [{quoted}](name=I am Pacman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T9XJaGx5,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-06-13T18:13:15.050+0000)
>
> Almost 100 kills in a single game, wtf is that elo.

Average ranking was bronze 2. If i remember correctly our average team mmr was roughly 1100.
14 wards is low In that amount of time, also galio suppor doesn't work well

> [{quoted}](name=ratzy9,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T9XJaGx5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-13T17:40:10.730+0000)
>
> 14 wards is low In that amount of time, also galio suppor doesn't work well

It worked well there... he just didn't ward well really. If he went 4/2/44 I wouldn't blame it on support galio.

> [{quoted}](name=ratzy9,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T9XJaGx5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-06-13T17:40:10.730+0000)
>
> 14 wards is low In that amount of time, also galio suppor doesn't work well

I've fair bit of galio support and tends to work well.

Your ADC Yasuo placed as many wards as you did, and destroyed more wards than you.

Ward placement is factored into your grade as a support, and you placed fewer than you should have for your role. Especially since you didn't build a Sightstone.

> [{quoted}](name=Reaper Review,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=T9XJaGx5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-13T17:38:44.744+0000)
>
> Your ADC Yasuo placed as many wards as you did, and destroyed more wards than you.
> 
> Ward placement is factored into your grade as a support, and you placed fewer than you should have for your role. Especially since you didn't build a Sightstone.

As i said in the post itself. This is a salt fueled rant. Even if my warding wasn't great, my kill participation and assistance in objectives was massive comparatively to most average players. This is just my feelings. and i feel as though this grade was too low for the performance I displayed.

Holy crap what is that Garen build...

As for the actual topic it's just a grade system.  You did well that game, so you got an above average grade.  You did not, however, play like one of the best people who play Galio support.  Wards are a clear point of improvement, however game length typically hurts the grade.  I'd be surprised if anyone got an S that game just due to how long it went on and the lack of truly remarkable stats.
